test.input: A driver is any person that drives a vehicle.
test.output: EquivalentClasses(Class(Driver driver) ObjectIntersectionOf(Class(Person person) ObjectSomeValuesFrom(ObjectProperty(drive drives) Class(Vehicle vehicle))))

test.input: A bus driver is any person that drives a bus.
test.output: EquivalentClasses(Class(BusDriver bus driver) ObjectIntersectionOf(Class(Person person) ObjectSomeValuesFrom(ObjectProperty(drive drives) Class(Bus bus))))

test.input: A grown-up is any person that is an adult.
test.output: EquivalentClasses(Class(Grown-up grown-up) ObjectIntersectionOf(Class(Person person) Class(Adult adult)))

test.input: A wizard is a person who performs magic.
test.output: EquivalentClasses(Class(Wizard wizard) ObjectIntersectionOf(Class(Person person) ObjectSomeValuesFrom(ObjectProperty(perform performs) Class(Magic magic))))

test.input: A wizard is a person who can perform magic.
test.output: EquivalentClasses(Class(Wizard wizard) ObjectIntersectionOf(Class(Person person) ObjectSomeValuesFrom(ObjectProperty(perform perform) Class(Magic magic))))

test.input: A driver is any person that can drive a vehicle.
test.output: EquivalentClasses(Class(Driver driver) ObjectIntersectionOf(Class(Person person) ObjectSomeValuesFrom(ObjectProperty(drive drive) Class(Vehicle vehicle))))

test.input: A wizard's child is any person that drives a vehicle.
test.output: EquivalentClasses(ObjectSomeValuesFrom(ObjectProperty(childOf child of) Class(Wizard wizard)) ObjectIntersectionOf(Class(Person person) ObjectSomeValuesFrom(ObjectProperty(drive drives) Class(Vehicle vehicle))))

test.input: The child of a wizard is any person that drives a vehicle.
test.output: EquivalentClasses(ObjectSomeValuesFrom(ObjectProperty(childOf child of) Class(Wizard wizard)) ObjectIntersectionOf(Class(Person person) ObjectSomeValuesFrom(ObjectProperty(drive drives) Class(Vehicle vehicle))))

test.input: A slave is a person who is wealthy.
test.output: EquivalentClasses(Class(Slave slave) ObjectIntersectionOf(Class(Person person) DataHasBoolValue(DataProperty(isWealthy XSD_BOOLEAN is wealthy) true)))

test.input: A slave is a person who is not wealthy.
test.output: EquivalentClasses(Class(Slave slave) ObjectIntersectionOf(Class(Person person) DataHasBoolValue(DataProperty(isWealthy XSD_BOOLEAN is wealthy) false)))
